content: 3 more rounds stockinette change to smaller needles and knit 7 rounds k2 p2 rib cast off in rib thumb using the larger needle pick up the 9 11 stitches from the waste yarn and then pick up 3 more stitches in the gap 12 14 stitches divide stitches evenly and knit 6 rounds of stockinette cast off loosely weave in ends and block if desired variations there was quite a bit of yarn leftover so you can easily add length by knitting more rounds before starting the thumb gusset use 1x1 rib on the cuffs instead of 2x2 or 3x1 etc for a medium size co 34 and use 1x1 ribs on cuffs increase thumb to 9 stitches as with smaller size
